#summary Old-style CvMat

= Reference =

Structure CvMat is replaced by the more robust and more efficient Mat class. 

|| *OpenCV* || *PyOpenCV* ||
|| CvMat || Mat ||
|| cvMat, cvCreateMatHeader, cvInitMatHeader, cvCreateMat || Mat's constructors ||
|| cvReleaseMat || no need to invoke but if you insist: Mat.release ||
|| cvIncRefData ||  (removed) ||
|| cvDecRefData || (removed) ||
|| cvCloneMat|| Mat.clone ||
